issue.title: [CF 1295] Track visibility state of non-controller icons in controlled group
issue.body:
Currently it isn't possible to track the visibility status of icons other than the group controller in controlled groups. I would like to be able to do so, primarily as a means of tracking how many instances of a particular debuff I have active.

As a specific example, if I have an invisible group controlled by tracking all instances I have active of thrash, if I was to track the visibility status of the 4th icon in the group, that would tell me that I currently have (atleast) 4 instances of thrash active currently. In this case, it would or could be used as a pseudo-aoe check (x number of targets minimum with debuff = altered priority list).


> Posted by CurseForge user user_976011 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1295 | Raw
